title: Shark Attack
subtitle: Was the shark that tore the boy's arm off lured to the shore by the boy's uncle, who had been fishing for sharks?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The media is aware that the bull shark that mauled 8-year-old Jessie Arbogast was one his uncle had been fishing for and fighting on a line for two hours, but they are suppressing that information.
